name: Chiquinquirá Delgado

last_movies.title: 海上谋杀案 第一季

introduction: Chiquinquira Delgado, a Venezuelan with a renowned international career as host and actress is one of the most charismatic personalities on screen.In 2010, upon signing an exclusivity contract with the prestigious Univision, Chiqui is positioned as the official host of the hit show "Mira quien baila", after its very successful first season the network presents her with her new challenge, to join the lines of the morning show "Despierta America", where she now hosts her own extra hour called "La Hora VIP".Crowned as First runner-up in "MissVenezuela 1990" Chiquinquira; started on the fashion runways of Venezuela where she has had a career full of successes. Her television debut came as the host for TV variety show "TV Time", in 1999, she takes to acting and is carefully groomed by the skilled writer and producer, Cesar Miguel Rondon, starring in the drama series "Calypso". Together with this, she becomes the on-screen image of Sony Entertainment Television and co-host of segments titled "Lo Ultimo" and "Estilo Sony". This experience catapults her into the screens of all of Latin America.Her greatest recognition to date, as an actress, occurs in 2003, when she co-stars in one of the most successful Venezuelan television drama series "Cosita Rica". At the same time she co-hosts a TV program called "La Guerra de los Sexos", widely viewed throughout Latin America with excellent ratings.In 2005, she stars as host of Portadas, a daily morning show on Venezuelan television, which enjoyed enormous ratings and success, and where Chiquinquira; sparkled with her kindness, and power of communication. That same year, she made a strategic alliance with pharmaceutical company "Laboratorios Vargas", and launched her own skin care product line "CHIQUI", into the Venezuelan market. Amongst the many products she has represented, you can find Pantene, Pepsi Cola, Coca Cola, to mention a few.
